summary: Comprehensive testing of Demo & Pricing buttons with Stripe payment integration. All 19 backend API tests pass (100%). Frontend UI fully functional with Demo modal (6 steps), Pricing modal (3 tiers), and Stripe checkout redirect working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: LandingPage.jsx correctly uses data-testid attributes for Demo and Pricing buttons
Pricing modal displays all 3 tiers (Starter $49, Professional $99, Enterprise Custom) with correct features
ApiService.js properly implements createCheckoutSession and getPaymentStatus methods
Dashboard.jsx implements payment status polling with checkPaymentStatus callback
Backend payments.py uses emergentintegrations library for Stripe checkout correctly
Package validation prevents frontend from manipulating payment amounts (security best practice)
MongoDB _id properly excluded from API responses

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All modals, buttons, and Stripe integration working)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Payment integration fully tested. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_payments.py cover: packages endpoint, checkout session creation (all 3 tiers), payment status retrieval, subscription status, and transactions list. Frontend tests verified Demo modal (6 steps with navigation), Pricing modal (3 tiers with correct prices and features), and full checkout flow redirecting to Stripe.

demo_modal.details: 6-step interactive tour with Previous/Next navigation, step indicators, and Get Started button on final step

pricing_modal.details: Displays 3 tiers - Starter ($49), Professional ($99 with 'Most Popular' badge), Enterprise (Custom)

GET /api/payments/packages.details: Returns all 3 packages with correct amounts, currencies, and features

POST /api/payments/checkout.details: Creates Stripe checkout session, returns URL and session_id, requires auth

GET /api/payments/status/{session_id}.details: Returns payment status (open/unpaid for new sessions), requires auth

GET /api/payments/subscription.details: Returns user subscription status, requires auth

GET /api/payments/transactions.details: Returns list of user transactions, requires auth

stripe_checkout_redirect.details: Clicking 'Start Free Trial' redirects to https://checkout.stripe.com/...

dashboard_payment_status.details: Dashboard loads correctly, payment status polling implemented in checkPaymentStatus callback

stripe_integration_notes.test_mode: Using sk_test_emergent key in test mode
stripe_integration_notes.real_stripe_integration: NOT MOCKED - uses real Stripe test mode via emergentintegrations library
